{
  "package_type": "user_experience_validation",
  "priority": "critical",
  "scope": "chat_functionality_testing",
  "target_specialists": ["user-experience-auditor", "test-automation-engineer"],
  "coordination_metadata": {
    "phase": "6_validation",
    "dependencies": ["frontend_fix_complete", "backend_validation_complete"],
    "success_trigger": "production_site_accessibility"
  },
  "testing_context": {
    "objective": "Validate chat functionality from user perspective",
    "test_environment": "Production site - http://aiwfe.com and https://aiwfe.com",
    "user_workflow": "Complete chat message send/receive cycle",
    "automation_requirement": "Playwright browser automation mandatory"
  },
  "test_specifications": {
    "functional_tests": [
      "Navigate to chat interface",
      "Send test message",
      "Verify message appears in chat",
      "Confirm message timestamp",
      "Validate WebSocket connection status"
    ],
    "user_experience_tests": [
      "Interface responsiveness during message send",
      "Message delivery confirmation feedback",
      "Error handling for connection issues",
      "Chat interface visual integrity"
    ]
  },
  "evidence_requirements": {
    "mandatory_evidence": [
      "Playwright test execution screenshots",
      "Browser automation interaction logs",
      "Production site accessibility curl outputs",
      "WebSocket connection success confirmation",
      "Complete user workflow demonstration"
    ],
    "validation_commands": [
      "curl -I http://aiwfe.com (production accessibility)",
      "curl -I https://aiwfe.com (SSL production accessibility)",
      "Playwright: page.goto, page.click, page.type, page.screenshot",
      "Browser network monitoring during chat interaction"
    ]
  },
  "tools_required": [
    "Bash (production site validation)",
    "Browser automation (Playwright testing)",
    "WebFetch (site accessibility verification)",
    "Screenshots (visual evidence capture)"
  ],
  "success_criteria": {
    "production_access": "Both HTTP and HTTPS sites accessible",
    "chat_functionality": "Messages send and receive successfully", 
    "user_experience": "Smooth interaction without errors",
    "visual_integrity": "Chat interface displays correctly",
    "automation_evidence": "Playwright execution logs with screenshots"
  }
}
